    • Uses of Counter in com.turvo.abcbanking.service.impl

      Methods in com.turvo.abcbanking.service.impl that return Counter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Counter CounterServiceImpl.assignOperator(java.lang.String assignerId, java.lang.Long branchId, java.lang.Integer counterNumber, java.lang.String operatorId)
      Inputs are validated Access is checked counter is updated in DB and synchronously updated in JVM cache.
      Counter CounterServiceImpl.assignSteps(java.lang.String assignerId, java.lang.Long branchId, java.lang.Integer counterNumber, java.util.List<ServiceStep> steps)
      Inputs are validated Access is checked counter steps mapping is synchronously updated in DB.
      private Counter BranchServiceImplTest.createCounter(java.lang.Integer counterNumber, CustomerType type, java.lang.Long... steps) 
      Counter CounterServiceImpl.createNewCounter(java.lang.String creatorId, java.lang.Long branchId, Counter counter)
      Branch Id is validated Access is checked Passed counter instance is validated counter is persisted in DB and synchronously updated in JVM cache.
      Counter BranchServiceImpl.getBestCounter(java.lang.Long branchId, CustomerType type, java.lang.Long stepId)
      All the counters within a branch serving passed customer type are short-listed.
      private Counter CounterServiceImpl.getCounter(java.lang.Long branchId, java.lang.Integer counterNumber)
      counter is fetched from branch instance retrieved from JVM cache, exception is thrown if found none
      private Counter CounterServiceImpl.getCounterFull(Counter counter)
      Fetches services steps for a counter from DB Fetches tokens assigned to a counter from DB tokens are pushed to counter queue in order of retrieval If branch is refreshed from DB again, it is possible that tokens are not added to counter queue in the same order as it was before DB doesn't maintain counter queue order.
      Counter BranchServiceImpl.updateCounter(Counter counter)
      parent branch is fetched for a counter branch's counter map is updated and entire branch object is updated in JVM cache
      Methods in com.turvo.abcbanking.service.impl that return types with arguments of type Counter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Counter> CounterServiceImpl.getBranchCountersFromDB(java.lang.Long branchId)
      Fetches all counters in branch from DB and fetches all internal components using breadth first search approach
      Methods in com.turvo.abcbanking.service.impl with parameters of type Counter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void CounterServiceImpl.checkOperatorAccess(java.lang.String userId, Counter counter)
      counter operator id is matched against passed userId, exception is thrown if they don't match
      Counter CounterServiceImpl.createNewCounter(java.lang.String creatorId, java.lang.Long branchId, Counter counter)
      Branch Id is validated Access is checked Passed counter instance is validated counter is persisted in DB and synchronously updated in JVM cache.
      private Counter CounterServiceImpl.getCounterFull(Counter counter)
      Fetches services steps for a counter from DB Fetches tokens assigned to a counter from DB tokens are pushed to counter queue in order of retrieval If branch is refreshed from DB again, it is possible that tokens are not added to counter queue in the same order as it was before DB doesn't maintain counter queue order.
      Counter BranchServiceImpl.updateCounter(Counter counter)
      parent branch is fetched for a counter branch's counter map is updated and entire branch object is updated in JVM cache
